d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - General - INNs for selected products, inc. derived and referenced products
d2_dictionary.title: Provides a list of International Non-proprietary Names (INNs) defined in the Product Registration Forms for the specified products, including product aliases and derived / referenced products.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
d2_dictionary.dql: select distinct inn_names as name from cd_product_info where product_code in ($repeatingvalue(product_codes)) or product_aliases in ($repeatingvalue(product_codes)) or derived_product_codes in ($repeatingvalue(product_codes)) or referenced_product_codes in ($repeatingvalue(product_codes)) and inn_names != ' ' order by 1 enable(row_based)
